lines.text:
[to Geoffrey]
I was planning to be on a plane tonight. I've got better things to do than swan around like a fairy.

[to Teller]
Whatever Geoffrey has been telling you, bringing horses back from the dead is not my specialty.
When it comes to horses, Mr. Cleveland, there's no such thing as a certainty - on or off the track.

[to Cleveland]
As your immediate supervisor, I insist that you come on the trip, and I insist that you enjoy it.
There's only one thing you have to know about horses.
They make damn fools out of us.
The best things in life are free.
Yeah, by people with no money.
